title: no internet with Hotspot on Pixel 2 XL
content: i connect my Windows Computer and LG V20 phone to the network from my hotspot on my Pixel, it connect, but not have internet connection, when i ping from CMD on Windows looks like we have internet Conection, but still not work on Chrome, Outlook, etc. this is a problem of my pixel, when i try hotspot on LG V20 it works. Please Help me
